1.title: TSA vs Rita Guida
1.plot: Season 2 Episode 1 - Jesse, a TSA agent, has a run in with Rita Guida. All hell breaks loose when the Brooklyn Guida has to get through the Pre-Check Security line at the airport.

2.title: Charging Station - TSA vs Rita Guida Part2
2.plot: Charging Station -TSA VS Rita Guida PART 2- in association with Waiting Room FilmsLA. When we last saw Rita she was stuck in the airport jail for assaulting a TSA agent. Her family is panicked because she was unable to collect money on a debt. Rita must figure out how to get the money back, get home, and plan her revenge on the Jesse the TSA agent who stole her Australian Pradas.

3.title: How Rita Got Her Shoes Back!
3.plot: How Rita Got her Shoes back- Episode 3-After Jesse the TSA agent stole Rita's Australian Pradas for his girl Tammy Lynn at the airport...Rita has thought of nothing but those shoes...and now she is coming to get them back.

1.title: How to Collect a Debt
1.plot: Welcome to the NEW "Rita Guida Show". Episode 1. Rita shows you "HOW TO COLLECT A DEBT" with her 2 friends Sasha and Pasha. They will show you the right and wrong way to collect money from someone who owes you.

2.title: How to Get a BFF
2.plot: In this 2nd Episode Of "The Rita Guida Show". Rita Guida Shows you how to get your very own BFF by following 3 simple rules.

3.title: Rita Therapy
3.plot: In the Third Episode of "The Rita Guida Show", Rita Guida goes to see Margaret, a therapist, to help direct her anger in a more positive way. Just count to three.

4.title: Rita Therapy 2- Asians, Boricuas, Blondes OH MY!
4.plot: Annabella, a sexy Italian, seeks counseling from Margaret, the Therapist, about her relationship with her boyfriend Craig. Annabella has a problem...a math problem.

imdb.plot outline: The Rita Guida Show, created by Maria Paris, is an episodic comedy short (1-3 minute) series. Rita Guida (played by Maria Paris) is a big-hearted shoe wielding NY Mafia hit woman who tries to blend into Los Angeles while starting a bi-coastal family business. However, blending in isn't easy and she has a hard time not using her skill set to help save the day. Rita feels it is her God giving right to take the law into her own hands to help others in need and teach them how to be more like her. With the help of her therapist, Margaret, she tries to curb her mafia ways when dealing with people she finds annoying or that just don't get it. Each episode is full of hilarity with new characters and new obstacles. The show is mainly in English but offers subtitles when Italian is spoken.
imdb.title: The Rita Guida Show
plot: A big hearted shoe wielding New York Mafia hit woman tries to blend into LA as she starts a bi-coastal family business.::Maria Paris

_The Rita Guida Show_ (qv), created by Maria Paris, is an episodic comedy short (1-3 minute) series. Rita Guida (played by Maria Paris) is a big-hearted shoe wielding NY Mafia hit woman who tries to blend into Los Angeles while starting a bi-coastal family business. However, blending in isn't easy and she has a hard time not using her skill set to help save the day. Rita feels it is her God giving right to take the law into her own hands to help others in need and teach them how to be more like her. With the help of her therapist, Margaret, she tries to curb her mafia ways when dealing with people she finds annoying or that just don't get it. Each episode is full of hilarity with new characters and new obstacles. The show is mainly in English but offers subtitles when Italian is spoken.::Maria Paris
